name: Java
description: Java is a widely used object-oriented programming language that is designed to have as few implementation dependencies as possible.

name: C++
description: C++ is a general-purpose programming language that was developed as an extension of the C language, adding support for object-oriented programming.

name: Python
description: Python is a high-level programming language known for its simplicity and readability, and is used in a wide range of applications.

name: C#
description: C# is a modern, general-purpose programming language that is used to develop a variety of applications on the Microsoft .NET platform.

name: Ruby
description: Ruby is a dynamic, object-oriented programming language that is known for its simplicity and productivity.

name: Objective-C
description: Objective-C is a general-purpose, object-oriented programming language that is used primarily for developing software for Apple's macOS and iOS.

name: JavaScript
description: JavaScript is a high-level, interpreted programming language that is primarily used for adding interactivity to web pages.

name: PHP
description: PHP is a server-side scripting language that is used to develop dynamic web applications.

name: Perl
description: Perl is a highly capable, feature-rich programming language that is used in a wide range of applications, including web development and system administration.

name: Swift
description: Swift is a powerful and intuitive programming language that is used to develop applications for Apple's macOS, iOS, watchOS, and tvOS.

name: Rust
description: Rust is a systems programming language that is designed to be safe, concurrent, and fast.

name: Go
description: Go is an open-source programming language that is designed to be efficient, reliable, and scalable.

name: Kotlin
description: Kotlin is a statically typed programming language that is designed to interoperate fully with Java.

name: Scala
description: Scala is a modern, object-oriented programming language that is designed to be concise and expressive.

name: Haskell
description: Haskell is a purely functional programming language that is used primarily in academia and research.
